scripts.pack:chrome: pnpm clean && pnpm build && pnpm mkdir && cd dist && zip -r "../build/chrome-extension-v$npm_package_version.zip" .
scripts.pack:firefox: pnpm clean && BROWSER=firefox pnpm build && pnpm mkdir && cd dist && zip -r "../build/firefox-extension-v$npm_package_version.zip" .
scripts.pack:brave: pnpm clean && BROWSER=brave pnpm build && pnpm mkdir && cd dist && zip -r "../build/brave-extension-v$npm_package_version.zip" .
scripts.pack:all: rm -rf build && pnpm pack:chrome && pnpm pack:firefox && pnpm pack:brave
